p.d: Victoire and Florent have to keep their relationship secret, but a mysterious blackmailer threatens them. Éric Merlin, one of Marion's former patients, declares having had an affair with her. Anne and Pierre decide to close the restaurant, against Florent's wishes. Victoire collapses and ends up in hospital. Directed by: Lionel Bailliu (France, 2019) Screenplay: Lionel Bailliu, Yann Le Gall Cast: Julie Gayet (Victoire Delorme), Bruno Debrandt (Florent Malléval), Thomas Jouannet (Samuel Delorme), Marie Dompnier (Marion Malléval), Joyce Bibring (Alexandra), Sylvie Granotier (Anne), Alain Doutey (Pierre), Cyrielle Voguet (Émilie), Anne Décis (Ms Carlier), Lucie Fruttero (Léa), Maxime Delacolonge (Hugo), Max Libert (Mathieu) Genre: detective
